description: This apt is in the historic Mott Haven neighborhood, next door to an art gallery and library, just 1 subway stop from Manhattan, 2 subway stops from Central park & the Metropolitan Museum. The apt is beautiful & comfortable, with plants, books and art. The full sized bed has a tempurpedic mattress—very comfortable. Unlike many studios the bedroom is separate from the fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Lots of storage space, and laundry in the basement. Perfect for one person or a couple.
name: Spacious Studio apt—1 Subway stop from Manhattan
review: The host canceled this reservation 22 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
